name: Ströer SE & Co. KGaA
description: Ströer SE & Co. KGaA is a leading German out-of-home (OOH) advertising company that specializes in outdoor advertising, digital marketing, and media services. Founded in 1984, Ströer has established itself as a key player in the advertising market, providing innovative advertising solutions that leverage both traditional and digital formats. The company's portfolio includes a wide range of outdoor advertising formats, such as billboards, street furniture, and transit advertising, as well as digital advertising solutions that are tailored to meet the needs of various clients. Ströer operates numerous digital screens and platforms, allowing for dynamic ad content and targeted campaigns to reach diverse audiences. With a commitment to quality and creativity, Ströer continues to evolve its offerings, utilizing data analytics to enhance advertising effectiveness and ROI for clients. The company also invests in social media and influencer marketing, expanding its reach in a rapidly changing advertising landscape. Ströer's dedication to sustainability and corporate responsibility is reflected in its efforts to promote eco-friendly advertising solutions and contribute positively to the communities in which it operates. With a strong focus on innovation, Ströer aims to shape the future of advertising in an era of digital transformation.

seo.meta_title: Ströer SE & Co. KGaA | Leading Out-of-Home Advertising Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Ströer SE & Co. KGaA, a top player in out-of-home advertising and digital marketing in Germany. Learn about our innovative advertising solutions and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What type of advertising does Ströer specialize in?
faq.answer: Ströer specializes in outdoor advertising and digital marketing solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Ströer?
faq.answer: Uwe K. Ströer is the CEO of Ströer SE & Co. KGaA.

faq.question: Where is Ströer headquartered?
faq.answer: Ströer is headquartered in Cologne, Germany.

faq.question: What are Ströer's main products?
faq.answer: Ströer's main products include billboards, street furniture, transit advertising, and digital advertising solutions.
